text.0: bring sacrificial gifts to him omniscient for he longs to drink.
text.1: the wanderer who comes with speed the hero ever in the van.
text.2: with soma go ye nigh to him chief drinker of the somas juice.
text.3: with beakers to the impetuous god to indra with the drops effused.
text.4: what time with soma with the juice effused ye come before the god.
text.5: full wise he knows the hope of each and bold one strikes this foe and that.
text.6: to him adhvaryu yea to him give offerings of the juice expressed.
text.7: will he not keep us safely from the spiteful curse of each presumptuous highborn foe.
